Articles.Content:
I'm sure i could rename the active ship from the map screen by clicking its name. Not anymore in 0.90...

Was the option removed ?
The option exists in the tracking station in 0.90. I don't know if it existed before in the map view as well though

I can do it from the Tracking Station, but not from map view. That's what i find abnormal...

Maybe my memories are playing tricks and mixing up map and tracking station
I don't remember ever being able to edit a ship name anywhere other than right clcking on a pod or probe.

I don't remember ever being able to edit a ship name anywhere other than right clcking on a pod or probe.

Until I saw someone on here saying you could, neither did I lol

Just checked against my 0.25 install - as with 0.90 you can rename from the TC but not map view.

For those that aren't familiar with this feature - it's handy for organising what can/can't be seen by changing the type as well as the name.

And for those that are new to the Tracking Centre and Map view - you can change what types of vehicle are shown at any time by left/right clicking the icons at the top-centre of the screen (move the mouse there to reveal them in map view).
